Q_DESC:
We don't know how matrimonial site works.The task is to help Shaddi.com as their server is crashed.To protect the identity of the clients they provided an array.The job is to find a pair with a given difference from the array.

Input:
The first line contains size of the array.
The second line contains the elements of the array.
The third Line contains the difference

Output:
The output contains the pair to be found.
